name: Marble Tower
description:
I didn't get as much time as I thought I would and ended up rushing 50% of the game in the last 24hrs (whoops). My goal with this game was to hopefully simulate the feeling of a real marble maze, I wanted the real world gravity to feel like it was affecting the game. therefor this game is best played on Android with gyro controls, however I did make some PC versions just so everyone can at least try it out.

Theme: Gravity

Music by: TheOriginal201
